questions.question_text: What is the most efficient way to get cases to be dosed automatically after a few days?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer: D. Activate the Auto Close Resolved Cases flow

Selected Answer: D
Answer: D. Activate the Auto Close Resolved Cases flow

Explanation: Auto Close Resolved Cases Flow Designer flow closes the case, however, "This flow is not active by default."

source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/auto-close-customer-service-case.html

choices.B: Create a workflow associated with cases with a timer that changes the state after a few days
choices.A: Set the property glide.auto.close.cases resolved to true
choices.D: Activate the Auto Close Resolved Cases flow
choices.C: Create a Scheduled job that looks at the resolved_at date

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
Field service dispatchers (wm_dispatcher), field service technicians (wm_agent), customer service managers (sn_customerservice_manager), and customer service agents (sn_customerservice_agent) can specify both skills and mandatory skills for cases and tasks.

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/mandatory-skills.html

Selected Answer: AB
AB is Correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/sandiego-field-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/mandatory-skills_1.html

questions.question_text: Which roles can specify both skills and mandatory skills for cases and tasks? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

Selected Answer: A
An account can have multiple contacts but a contact can be associated with only one account.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-csm-accounts-contacts.html

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

questions.question_text: An account is a supported external customer and a contact is a user who is an employee of an account. How many accounts can a contact be associated with?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
New ServiceNow version

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

choices.D: Shareable across KBs: Yes ; Multi-Level: Yes
choices.C: Shareable across KBs: No ; Multi-Level: No
choices.A: Shareable across KBs: Yes ; Multi-Level: No
choices.B: Shareable across KBs: No ; Multi-Level: Yes

questions.question_text: What are the characteristics of Knowledge Categories?
A contact can submit a self-registration request from the customer portal with a registration code. Which of the following roles can approve the request? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCD
BCD is Correct

Selected Answer: BCD
BCD is Correct

Selected Answer: BCD
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/t_ApproveRegRequestWithValidCode.html

requires sn_customerservice.customer_admin role, which is contained in sn_customerservice.partner_admin.
Correct Ans is B, C, D
